```{r read-cpi}
fn <- "https://dasl.datadescription.com/download/data/3138"
cpi <- read_tsv(fn, col_types=cols())
cpi$t <- 2007 + (1:132)/12
cpi <- cpi[1:128, ]
```

### CPI line graph

```{r cpi-graph}
initiate_image()
ggplot(cpi, aes(x=t, y=CPI)) +
  geom_line()
finalize_image("Line graph showing increase over time of the consumer price index")
```
